item.title: Towards Physical Understanding in Video Generation: A 3D Point Regularization Approach
item.description: This paper introduces PointVid, a 3D-aware video generation framework using 3D point regularization to enhance video realism and address common issues like object morphing.

item.title: QLASS: Boosting Language Agent Inference via Q-Guided Stepwise Search
item.description: QLASS boosts language agent inference by using Q-values to guide a stepwise search, improving efficiency and performance even with limited data.

item.title: OmniFlow: Any-to-Any Generation with Multi-Modal Rectified Flows
item.description: OmniFlow: a novel generative model masters any-to-any multi-modal generation, outperforming existing models and offering flexible control!
